title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1234/84 of 3 May 1984 re-establishing the levying of customs duties on other ball bearings with greatest external diameter not more than 30 mm, falling within heading No ex 84.62 and originating in Singapore, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3569/83 apply
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1234/84
of 3 May 1984
re-establishing the levying of customs duties on other ball bearings with greatest external diameter not more than 30 mm, falling within heading No ex 84.62 and originating in Singapore, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3569/83 apply
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 May 1984.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 362, 24. 12. 1983, p. 1.
